abstract: American drone strike kills Hazrat Umar, brother of top Pakistani Taliban commander Maulvi Nazir Nazir, and three other aides in South Waziristan.
snippet: An American drone strike on Thursday is the latest in a string of drone attacks targeting militants based in Pakistan’s northwestern region.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: An American drone strike on Thursday is the latest in a string of drone attacks targeting militants based in Pakistan’s northwestern region.

headline.main: Drone Strike in Pakistan Kills Brother of Militant Commander
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: U.S. Drone Strike Kills Brother of a Taliban Commander
headline.seo: Drone Strike in Pakistan Kills Brother of Taliban Fighter
